title: [PBE] No champion icons in champ selection
body: So I played a custom PBE game as Kled and when Elise and Kalista logged in their champions it was just a black spot at their champion portrait. Just wanted to post the bug before I go to sleep I can't find any circumstance causing it.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! In the future, please use the [report a bug feature](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/bugReport/create) on PBE to report bugs on PBE, as opposed to live. It helps us better keep track of where issues are occurring. ^-^ 

This is pretty common on PBE, as the assets aren't implemented just yet. This will absolutely be resolved before the skins hit live. :)
